name: VEM Global
tag_list: search-engine-marketing, search-engine-optimization, phone-call-tracking, call-tracking-technology, website-design, web-analytics, phone-analyitcs, advertising-network, marketing, advertising
overview:
VEMGlobal is an online media and technology company that combines complete in-house web and media services, powerful marketing solutions and the latest tracking and analytics into one platform to help our clients survive and thrive in today’s new millennium.

We actively employ established internet practices including SEO, SEM, social media, video, website design and development, while providing web tracking and our proprietary call tracking analytics to analyze return on marketing investments. Our main goal is to help your business become more marketable and profitable in the new millennium.
